item.title: My Blog Set-up
item.description: I was planning to set-up a blog from my college days onwards.its been 5 years since I’m out of college.since I’m a miser person, I was always looking for cheapest hosting service ðŸ˜Ž also I don’t want the headaches of hosting like server management database management backups hosting/bandwidth/scalability/users And I have found solution for all this, for server management we can choose some hosting services like GitHub/Gitlab pages or Netfly.
